description:
Why run on icy pavement through the winter? Hit the trails running even when they're covered in snow. Spring-loaded suspension keeps them close underfoot, letting you maintain a smooth, natural stride on uneven ground.

  • 22in. V-frame is made of lightweight aluminum with a tapered shape to promote a natural gait
  • Spring-loaded suspension holds the snowshoes close underfoot to move freely, absorb impact, flex naturally and allow deep crampon penetration
  • Nytex decking resists abrasion, withstands cold temperatures and sheds snow
  • Aluminum Dual Trac™ toe and heel cleats offer lightweight traction for icy terrain
  • Lightweight Speed Helix bindings use the high performance Boa closure system that provides precision adjustment at the twist of a dial
name: Atlas Snow Run Boa Snowshoes - Unisex
